csdl.jupiter.util
Class PluginVersionCheck

java.lang.Object
  csdl.jupiter.util.PluginVersionCheck

public class PluginVersionCheck
extends java.lang.Object

Provides the version check function. Clients may call processUpdateDialog() to check new version on the server, whose URL is specified in the preference page, and bring update info dialog if the new version is available.

Version:
$Id: PluginVersionCheck.java,v 1.28 2005/05/06 07:41:09 takuyay Exp $
Author:
Takuya Yamashita

Method Detail

processUpdateDialog

public static void processUpdateDialog()
Processes update dialog to the user. The current version and new version appear in the dialog.
